verses.roman:
āmi ei nīlācale rahi ye vasiyā
pariśrama nāhi mora tomā sabāra lāgiyā

synonyms: āmi—I; ei—this; nīlācale—at Jagannātha Purī; rahi—remain; ye vasiyā—sitting; pariśrama nāhi mora—I have no fatigue; tomā sabāra lāgiyā—due to all of you.
translation: "There is no fatigue or trouble for Me, for I stay here at Nīlācala, Jagannātha Purī, and do not move at all. This is the favor of all of you.
